title: Laptop battery last 34 HOURS!
description: Check out the Dell Latitude 9510!  I built a gaming PC in THIRD PERSON  Have you subscribed to @thisis?    My new podcast The Test Drivers!  I stream on Twitch now!  We have a new Discord:  Subscribe!  Instagram:  Twitter:   0:00 The Plane Crash 2:45 Abandoned Gas Station 4:46 A Bad Idea 8:26 Night Falls 11:24 All Hope Is Lost
